name: My Next Life as a Bird
name_original: My Next Life as a Bird
description:
"My Next Life as a Bird" is a speedrun platformer game. You can customize/upgrade various speed data by using Bird Coin (For Example: Move Speed, Jump Speed, Dash Speed, Jump Count and so on) to evade incoming magical projectiles, and aim to reach the goal as quickly as possible, creating your own fastest completion record.

  • Super simple game and controls but challenging !
  • Cute protagonist - Hootie and funny NPCs !
  • Play with your own speed, your data is upgradeable through Bird-Coin.
  • Challenge high speed, go for the shortest time to reach the goal and earn more Bird-Coin.

You might fall but trust yourself... you are the fastest one!
